case.title: charming american girl seeking penpal - 23 (across the sea)
case.text:
simply im looking for someone to email that i can talk to without any boundaries.
im a spur of the moment adventurous nerdy type of girl and i just need someone in my life who is there who will listen and who i can build a relationship with based on that. who knows we might end up being perfect for each other :) i love love and am not opposed to that being the outcome of any of this. im a great girl to talk to and an even better girl to fall in love with .
please dont respond if you are over 33 no offense meant .
